Text: Is this a retail rip or yeat another re-encode of the HD China release?

That  surprises me because usually their stuff is crap. I just avoid them....

Regardless this was a good file.  Video and sound were good.  Video was very smooth and crips and no synch issues.
Tackar. för som vanligt när det gäller dina "releaser" är kvaliten mycket bra, även i xvid.
